amendment.purpose: An amendment comprised of Part B amendments Nos. 86, 87, 88, 89, 90, 91, 98, 99, 100, 101, 103, 104, 105, 109, 112, 115, 119, 121 and 142 printed in House Report 113-108.

action.text: Amendments en bloc (A024) offered by Mr. McKeon.
On agreeing to the McKeon amendments (A024) Agreed to by voice vote.
